abstract: Marc A. Spilker, the co-head of the company’s asset management division and a member of Goldman’s management committee, abruptly retired Friday.
snippet: Marc A. Spilker, the co-head of the company’s asset management division and a member of Goldman’s management committee, abruptly retired Friday.
lead_paragraph: Marc A. Spilker, the co-head of the Goldman Sachs Asset Management division and a member of Goldman’s management committee, abruptly retired from the Wall Street company on Friday.

headline.main: Goldman Picks New Leader in Asset Management Unit
headline.print_headline: Goldman Picks New Leader In Asset Management Unit
